page.title: Seedance 2.0 AI Video Generator
page.description: Create stunning cinematic videos with Seedance 2.0. Native audio sync, physics-based motion, multi-shot storytelling. Text-to-video, image-to-video & video-to-video supported.

generator.title: Seedance 2.0 Video Generator
generator.description: Generate cinematic AI videos with Seedance 2.0. Native audio sync, multimodal input, and physics-aware generation. Text-to-video, image-to-video & video-to-video.

form.prompt_placeholder: Describe the video content, such as scene, action, style, etc.
form.reference_image_placeholder: Upload a reference image for video generation
form.reference_video_placeholder: Enter the URL of the reference video
form.some_images_failed_to_upload: Image failed to upload, please delete and re-upload
form.prompt_too_long: Prompt is too long, please delete some content

generator.preview_examples_hint: These are sample videos created by Seedance 2.0. Fill in the form on the left and click "Generate Video" to create your own video.
generator.hint_async: You can close this page. We'll notify you when it's done.

preview_examples_hint: These are sample videos created using our platform. Fill in the form on the left and click "Generate Video" to create your own video.
